name: DEATH! WORD! BATTLE!
description:
When you wake up in a mysterious place, you must fight in order to prove your innocence and drive everyone to the truth behind the mysterious murders.

Sound Effects- Toby Fox (Deltarune)

Court Stand- Kazutaka Kodaka (Danganronpav3)

Pixel Sprites are based on Danganronpa as well.

Kitchen Picture- Peter Molick for Maureen Stevens

Group Discussion Background- VectorStock
